org.apache.spark.mllib.stat

Interface MultivariateStatisticalSummary

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MultivariateOnlineSummarizer

    public interface MultivariateStatisticalSummary
    Trait for multivariate statistical summary of a data matrix.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count()
      Sample size.
      Vector max()
      Maximum value of each column.
      Vector mean()
      Sample mean vector.
      Vector min()
      Minimum value of each column.
      Vector normL1()
      L1 norm of each column
      Vector normL2()
      Euclidean magnitude of each column
      Vector numNonzeros()
      Number of nonzero elements (including explicitly presented zero values) in each column.
      Vector variance()
      Sample variance vector.

    • Method Detail

      • mean

        Vector mean()
        Sample mean vector.

      • variance

        Vector variance()
        Sample variance vector. Should return a zero vector if the sample size is 1.

      • count

        long count()
        Sample size.

      • numNonzeros

        Vector numNonzeros()
        Number of nonzero elements (including explicitly presented zero values) in each column.

      • max

        Vector max()
        Maximum value of each column.

      • min

        Vector min()
        Minimum value of each column.

      • normL2

        Vector normL2()
        Euclidean magnitude of each column

      • normL1

        Vector normL1()
        L1 norm of each column
